mapper.select: select supply_id, sempno, item, sdescription, quantity, sdate from supply_TABLE order by supply_id desc
mapper.insert: insert into supply_TABLE(supply_id, sempno, item, quantity, sdescription) values (supply_TABLE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{sempno, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quantity, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sdescription, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select supply_id, sname, item, quantity, sdescription, sdate, sempno from supply_TABLE where supply_id=#{supply_id}
mapper.update: update supply_TABLE set item=#{item}, quantity=#{quantity}, sdescription=#{sdescription} where supply_id=#{supply_id}
